name: Kathy Stanley
text: Excellent experience, owner spent time taking about different items of interest. Loved the store, it took me down memory lane. Would highly recommend if your in the market for anything relating to playing pool. He had it all.

name: Joseph Sabye
text: This place is epic if you need anything billiards related. Owner was awesome. No pressure to buy anything but willing to help you find everything you need. Was a pleasure being a customer today.

name: Tim hankins
text: Bob is the Man! Always there to help just got a ob fusion an I love it!

name: Leslie Dials
text: Fantastic prices and great customer service always Bob will always treat you right

name: Carter Maxwell
text: The one stop shop for everything. Bob is the nicest guy. He won't over sell you. You tell him who you are, how you play, and often you play, he will match you with perfect gear. I will never buy my gear or have it serviced anywhere else.

name: Russell Falch
text: They have everything you could want from tables to chalk and everything in between

name: Brennen Sutter
text: Bob Cooke has always been helpful and very knowledgeable in the billiard world. I called last week about a particular shaft I was looking for. He had 1 left in stock and held it for me until I was able to pick it up today. Will always continue to do business with this man. 10 out of 10 !!!

name: Valerie Chavez
text: They have a great supply of all pool table needs. Bob was so friendly and made sure that I had what I needed and made sure it was perfect. I highly recommend R G Billiards if you play pool.

name: Joe Lambeth
text: The greatest service from a pool supply i have ever experienced. He has everything you need.

name: phil white
text: Bob is an awesome guy and his store has just about anything you need to play billiards

name: Sharon Murphy
text: Repair to the top half of my pool stick. But give me back the wrong top half.

name: sean clark
text: Great

name: Bettie Lockhart
text: Great place for cool accessories.

name: Tim Crumly
text: Great service and great prices very knowledgeable

name: Eric Joiner
text: Great experience Bob is a nice guy and very helpful.

name: Ron Butler
text: Great service excellent selections, very friendly

name: Brandon Coon
text: Ran well huge selection

name: Brandon
text: Great store the owner is awsome knows his stuff and can do alot of cue work worth a trip for quality and expertise at a fair price

name: Karissa Crozier
text: Guy was rude and not helpful. Agreed to help me sell pool table and to get back to me twice and never did. If he didn't want to help then just say. We spoke three times and he lied to me every time. Not helpful, very unprofessional and I'm just glad I don't have to have another conversation with this person.

name: Ramon Abreu
text: Take your business elsewhere, lying to customers and failing to follow through on agreements!!! What a JOKE!!

name: Kristel Reed
text: Good choices, nice owner, knowledgeable

name: lisa Nordhof
text: Enjoy playing here and they have pretty good food for such a small place

name: ChaseElliottFan9
text: Great place to play pool. Family oriented. Good food.

name: Chance Rosic
text: Good place.  Good tables. Good food. Good drinks. Good people.

name: Keith Cooper
text: If you like pool and a good time come on down to Papa G's where the good times roll

name: Teresa Mendoza
text: Great entertainment, good tables and food

name: Crystal Calhoun
text: Clean and very nice staff! Great Place to Shoot Pool

name: Michael Smith
text: I love Poppa G's everyone is family.

name: Eric Posey
text: I only go on league nights (Friday) to watch a friend play. Tables are many, around 20 maybe more. A/c is good. They sell supplies and offer repair services. The food is great, if you want a good cheeseburger or chicken sandwich. Very close to homemade. Service is fantastic, Amber is always there and makes you feel like you're part of the family. Best pool hall I've ever been to!

name: Jason Burrus
text: I just walked in and said I wanted to play league billiards. These guys got me signed up and on a team that week. Has been a great place full of friendly faces to learn and improve my game. Great tables, good food, clean, friendly staff...awesome!

name: ChaseElliottFan9
text: Great place to play pool. Family oriented. Good food.

name: Angel
text: One of the best places to shoot some pool and hang out with friends. The staff is awesome and will take great care of you. They have a great drink selection and they also have a small kitchen that pumps out one of the best club sandwiches in Pelham.

name: Robert Chambers
text: I went to papa g’s tonight to shoot a few games and check the place out. They have a great atmosphere and really good tables. There’s no smoking inside which was even better. Very clean, everything neat and in place. Plenty of room around the tables to shoot and good lighting over the table. The pro shop really does good work, had him install a new tip for me, he took his time and made sure it was right(sorry can’t remember his name). They also have a nice selection of cues in house competitively priced. I will definitely be going back.

name: Heather Bridgman
text: Huge pool hall. Prices are great, for the regular tables. Wasn't properly informed on prices for 9 foot tables. Overall, a great place to play. Staff was very friendly.

name: Hayden Wood
text: The staff here is INCREDIBLE! It seriously feels like walking into the set of Cheers. Everyone is friendly, personable, and helpful. They keep a tight ship and the place always looks nice. And The food and drink is really good too!

name: Tonya Roberts
text: We go all the way to Poppas Gs 3 to 4 times a week... And we live all the way in Oakman, AL... It is a family oriented place... Me and My family really enjoys going there to play Pool.... And the owner: Michael Glass is one of the most humble men I've ever met.. So.. With that being said.. We are apart of the POPPA Gs family... You will love it and I... promise u will come back for the 2nd, and 3rd and so on..  God bless

name: Lindsay Brand
text: Wonderful place that ALWAYS makes you feel like family!! Best waitresses around that ALWAYS remember your order!! (even extra cheese and pickles LOL) Wonderful place to shoot pool and have a great time!! Would give it more than 5 stars if I could!

name: Michele Mann (Chele)
text: Great place to play pool. Great food and service. Always a fun time when we go.

name: Angie Roddy
text: This is the most friendly place I have been to. Everyone extremely nice and are there to have fun. They have karaoke on Saturday nights great bar tenders and awesome food. Reasonable prices. The owner comes in ever night and personally talks and greats everyone. Great place for some family fun.

name: Tony Sides
text: Fantastic pool hall. I'm becoming a regular visitor.

name: katielourocks
text: Always a great experience.  The staff is amazing, the food and drinks are great, the tables are top notch, and it’s so clean. We love Poppa’s!!!!

name: Leslie Dials
text: Awesome staff great tables

name: Lindsay Brand
text: Wonderful place that ALWAYS makes you feel like family!! Best waitresses around that ALWAYS remember your order!! (even extra cheese and pickles LOL) Wonderful place to shoot pool and have a great time!! Would give it more than 5 stars if I could!

name: Karen Smith
text: Good service  good food and the fact that it's smoke free so it's good place to take your kids is a plus I love the fact that it's kid friendly!!!!

name: Angie Roddy
text: This is the most friendly place I have been to. Everyone extremely nice and are there to have fun. They have karaoke on Saturday nights great bar tenders and awesome food. Reasonable prices. The owner comes in ever night and personally talks and greats everyone. Great place for some family fun.

name: Bryan Daniel
text: Been going to this pool hall for over 20 years... The g was added and it really became a lovely venue... Great staff ...amazing owners and great tables

name: Gary Woods
text: Always have fun here. A great place to shoot pool, friendly staff, and great food. It's kid friendly as well so families can go have fun as well.

name: Christian Patterson
text: Pool, pool and more pool! Great crowd, great drinks, great food and great time! Always lives up to it expectations. Everyone is welcoming from staff to customers... which is a plus in my book!

name: Craig Salter
text: Love Poppa G's. Sara is really nice. Nice place.

name: michael hooten
text: I've been playing there for 14 years. Awesome place to get away, take someone out for the evening or find a game. Everyone one is respectful there. If someone were to get out of line there they would be corrected immediately  it's like second family for me no judgement in this pool hall. Food and service is A-1 come hang out you will see for yourself.

name: maddie5
text: Friendly atmosphere, staff and all around nice place to shoot pool.

name: Christopher Aguirre
text: Love it was awesome experience recommend everybody go here to play pool

name: Cammi Tolbert
text: Love that place

name: Ammie Latham
text: We always feel so welcome! Its like a big family.  The staff and owners are awesome!

name: Ryan Harmon
text: I have been playing APA League at this hall for two years now and it is definitely one of the best. Kid friendly and no smoking indoors either. Good menu and food too.

name: Lindsay Huffman
text: Wonderful place with great food and even better staff!!

name: Carolyn Murray
text: I had a blast. Great service and great people. Will definitely go back

name: Jena Montague
text: I have League they're the waitresses very nice the service is very well the food is excellent if you want to have a good time and playing pool I would highly suggest this place

name: London Dudley
text: Best tables in the area. Friendly crowd.

name: Kathleen Walker
text: I love Poppa G's Billiards great place to go play pool and have a few drinks. the people here are really friendly I would recommend this place to anyone.

name: Rodney Johnston
text: Very nice place and an amazing staff

name: Cory Williams
text: I play pool up at poppa gs on Thursday and Friday nights and the atmosphere and people are amazing

name: Cole Harmon
text: good food and service, but a complete disregard of the law concerning service animals, do not come here with a service animal.

name: Brenda Allen
text: Great place to play pool. Great food and service. Excellent Diamond pool tables.

name: Chandra Johnston
text: Lots of tables, food, beer, jukebox, reasonable prices. We will go back regularly!

name: David Friedman
text: Well laid out and good prices... Awesome food and Amber is awesome!!!!

name: alice cole
text: Nice and friendly atmosphere.  Food is okay

name: Kent Piatt
text: Birmingham best kept secret.

name: Amberleigh Henderson
text: The girls behind the bar are super attentive & friendly ☺ the food is way better than the prices suggest it may be. I don't come often & I'm not sure why cuz my friends & I always have a blast!

name: Tim Crumly
text: Great place other than slow service very nice pool tables at a very reasonable price will definitely be back

name: Nick red
text: 14ish total tables, all appear to be in pretty good shape. 6 bucks=all you can play, and pretty good food, too!

name: Lee Dobbs
text: Great 1st time experience at Pappa's. Look forward to starting league very soon!!!

name: Michael Richardson
text: Great place to play billiards. Clean and family friendly!

name: Angel Moore
text: My home away from home. Great place to relax, meet people and have lots of fun.

name: Kent Piatt
text: And on the 7th day, God went to Poppas to rest with the best people in town and knock some balls around.

name: eric jason
text:
Best pool hall in town !
Staff is great, tables are clean and great atmosphere.

name: Jenny Crawford
text: It's great if you like pool....if not they also have  booze.

name: Ben Lawson
text: Great place now that they have remodeled and don't allow smoking inside.

name: Angie Glass
text: Great place to play pool,meet people, and eat, drink,

name: Traci Witcher
text: Wonderful environment, you will leave with new friends

name: Brandon
text: The best pool hall around awsome people and great service

name: Julie Price
text: Great atmosphere with awesome service!! Love to play pool here!

name: Joshua Linson
text: Great atmosphere with awesome servers that take care of you

name: Kenneth Richter
text: Good prices plenty of  beautiful tables fun time.

name: Norman Green
text: Great place first time there pool tables are in great shape even the pool balls are professional quality 6 bucks a piece  for a table and play all you want for 6 bucks waitresses bring food and drinks to your table awesome place great atmosphere

name: RTC Ranch
text: Nice, freindly atmosphere catering to older league players

name: David Hooks
text: Great place for billiards food and tournaments. Has atm too.

name: Joann Knight
text: I didn't enjoy any of the music. I normally enjoy it very much.

name: Dana Chaffin
text: Nice place to go shoot pool!

name: Maggie Thompson
text: Good food and great atmosphere

name: Melissa Harris
text: Great place to relax with a little pool

name: Tasha Bush
text: Love this place!

name: KCLEE
text: NICE enough to go to,&be able to make good friends!!!

name: Del Hiestand
text: One of the best places to play pool

name: j mo
text: Awesome owners and great service and food

name: Roy Sullivan
text: Great place to shoot pool

text: Best place to play billiards

text: Great environment and kid friendly

text: Awesome place to shoot Pool and hang out

name: Brandon Bates

text:
The staff is great. Love the atmosphere.
🌟🌟🌟🌟🌟🌟🌟🌟🌟🌟

name: Michael Jones
text: Great place

name: Cindy Suttles
text: Always a wonderful place to be

name: Cammi Fry
text: Awesome place

name: Carloss fu
text: website said 6$ a table, rude lady said 6$ per person, and why do you have to be 21 to play pool????

resp.text: Hey Carloss,  sorry to hear about this.  As you can see our official website @ https://poppagsbilliards.com doesn't show any pricing.   You don't have to be 21 to play pool but you do have to be 21 to be in a bar in Pelham, AL.  We'd love to chat with you in regards to any of our staff being rude so that we can fix any issues necessary.  As you can see by all our other reviews that are 5 stars, customer service is priority and something we take great pride in.  Feel free to give us a call or come by during business hours and we'll be happy to do whatever possible to make sure your next Poppa G's visit is nothing shy of a 5-star experience.

name: Joshua Lucas
text: Plenty of tables, food to order, and always full of players

name: Patrick Vacarella
text: Great place great people

name: Joshua Lucas
text: Plenty of tables, food to order, and always full of players
